title: The typeface use on the cover : A Tree Grows in Brooklyn ?
content:
Hello Typophiles!

I was wondering if anyone knows what typeface is used on the original cover of A Tree Grows in Brooklyn?  
Thank you in advance for your kind help.

Thomas

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425025709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cover_type_4830.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Cover\_type.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425025709/http:/typophile.com/files/Cover_type.png) | 1016.05 KB |
author: Thomas Colligan

comments.content:
Hand lettered. Note variations in repeated letters.  
Don

Thank you Don!  
If anyone knows of a similar calligraphic typeface I would be very grateful!

Thomas

You're welcome.  
Approximate publication date?  
Don
